task.summary:
feat: implement full-stack foundation with React frontend and Go backend
- Created React frontend framework using Create React App as foundation - Integrated existing standalone projects (Ripple Effect and Download Effect) into new structure - Moved projects to `frontend/public/projects/` with proper folder structure - Each project maintains standalone functionality while being framework-compatible - Implemented core frontend architecture: - Added homepage layout in `frontend/src/App.js` - Created reusable Sidebar component in `frontend/src/components/Sidebar.js` - Established project context in `frontend/src/context/ProjectContext.js` - Set up Go backend service with basic REST API endpoints: - Initialized Go module in `backend/go.mod` - Created main server file in `backend/main.go` - Configured development environment for both frontend and backend

docs: completely restructure and expand project documentation
- Rewrote entire README.md to reflect new full-stack architecture - Added detailed project structure section with directory tree visualization - Created comprehensive installation guides for both frontend and backend - Expanded tech stack information to include React and Go specifics - Added development workflow instructions for full-stack environment - Reorganized content with new table of contents structure - Updated contribution guidelines to match new project standards - Maintained all original project examples while integrating into new framework

docs: add acknowledgements section with development tool credits
- Created new Acknowledgements section in README.md - Listed key development tools and their contributions: - Organized credits in bullet-point format with official links

feat: Add GitHub Pages deployment configuration - Added `homepage` field in `package.json` pointing to `https://youchenjiang.github.io/Project-List/` - Added `gh-pages` dependency for deploying the site to GitHub Pages - Added `predeploy` and `deploy` npm scripts for automated deployment process - Updated `config.js` to handle deployment environment: - Added `BASE_URL` variable for different paths in development and production - Added `PUBLIC_PATH` and `GITHUB_PAGES_BASE` variables for base path handling - Implemented `getProjectPath()` function to resolve project paths correctly in both local and GitHub Pages environments - Updated `projects.js` to use `getProjectPath()` function for dynamic path generation - Minor update to `ContentArea` component to fix iframe closing tag format - Added lock files (`package-lock.json`)

feat: implement full-stack foundation with React frontend and Go backend
- Created React frontend framework using Create React App as foundation - Integrated existing standalone projects (Ripple Effect and Download Effect) into new structure - Moved projects to `frontend/public/projects/` with proper folder structure - Each project maintains standalone functionality while being framework-compatible - Implemented core frontend architecture: - Added homepage layout in `frontend/src/App.js` - Created reusable Sidebar component in `frontend/src/components/Sidebar.js` - Established project context in `frontend/src/context/ProjectContext.js` - Set up Go backend service with basic REST API endpoints: - Initialized Go module in `backend/go.mod` - Created main server file in `backend/main.go` - Configured development environment for both frontend and backend

- Created new Acknowledgements section in README.md - Listed key development tools and their contributions: - Organized credits in bullet-point format with official links
